title: book_The_Politics_of_Injustice
text:
ISBN-13: 9780761929949.
ISBN-10: 0761929940.
Title: The Politics of Injustice.
Subtitle: Crime and Punishment in America.
Authors: Katherine Beckett;Theodore Sasson.
Categories: Political Science.
Thumbnail: http://books.google.com/books/content?id=GWM5DQAAQBAJ&printsec=frontcover&img=1&zoom=1&edge=curl&source=gbs_api.
Description: Examining the role of crime in American politics and culture, The Politics of Injustice, Second Edition provides a better understanding of the nature of crime and punishment in America, as well as the cultural and political contexts in which they occur. Updated throughout, this book will be of interest to students in all areas of Criminology especially those involved in critical issues in Criminal Justice..
Published Year: 2000.
